dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of training, reference and query images, used for the Image Similarity Challenge. The query image set contains strong auto-augmented and human-augmented images, and distractive images that may not appear in the reference set.
dcterms:title: DISC2021

dcterms:creator: Herve Jegou
Matthijs Douze
Cordelia Schmid
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to detect copied content, consisting of 157 original images and 2,000 queries with cropping, jpeg compressing and strong augmentations.
dcterms:title: Copydays

dcterms:creator: Bart Thomee

Gerald Friedland
Benjamin Elizalde
Karl Ni
Douglas Poland
Damian Borth
Li-Jia Li
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 100 million media objects, primarily images, used for multimedia research.
dcterms:title: YFCC100M

dcterms:creator: Wenhao Wang
Yifan Sun
Yi Yang
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset that incorporates hard negative distractors, enhancing the difficulty level of image copy detection.
dcterms:title: NDEC
